items.sentence: I want you all to know that I\'ll never change.
She couldn\'t convince him to accept the bribe.
She doesn\'t like to leave anything unfinished.
Tom finished his coffee and asked for a refill.
Tom fixed the roof of his house just yesterday.
Tom folded the paper before handing it to Mary.
Tom forgot the anniversary of their first date.
Tom forgot to lock the front door when he left.
Tom forgot to take his medication this morning.
Tom\'s mother would\'ve been very proud of him.
Tom hoped that he would become a famous writer.
Tom hosted an extravagant party at his mansion.
Tom introduced himself to everyone in the room.
Tom invited Mary to his place to watch a movie.
Tom doesn\'t seem to be interested in politics.
Tom doesn\'t seem to care one way or the other.
Tom doesn\'t speak French as well as Mary does.
Tom doesn\'t talk much about when he was young.
Tom said that he wants to read all these books.
Tom sat beside Mary and opened the photo album.
Tom sat in the waiting room reading a magazine.
Tom sat on the floor between the door and Mary.
Tom saved himself by jumping out of the window.
Tom spent the last years of his life in Boston.
I think all three of us will be there tomorrow.
I think that you should buy yourself a new car.
Tom hardly ever relies on other people\'s help.
Tom has a doctor\'s appointment this afternoon.
Tom said that he didn\'t know where Mary lived.
A permanent job is better than a temporary one.
I wish I could remember everything Tom told me.
I can\'t get along with the neighbors any more.
Tom kept Mary awake all night with his snoring.
Tom kept every love letter Mary ever wrote him.
Tom didn\'t say anything about why he was late.
We would rather go to the zoo than to the park.
Last night, I went to sleep with the lights on.
Tom isn\'t the only one who missed the meeting.
Tom used to love Mary. Now he can\'t stand her.
I wish that we didn\'t have to do this anymore.
Tom advised Mary to leave early in the morning.
Tom should tell Mary that she needs to do that.
Tom soon realized the seriousness of his error.
Tom speaks English with a strong French accent.
What would it take to get you to join our team?
What would you do if you had a billion dollars?
Everybody in the room let out a sigh of relief.
For Tom, getting fired was an unexpected shock.
The best day of my life was the day I met Mary.
The dance had already started when I got there.
